thread.title: iTravel Agents frock-up to experience a slice of fabulous Las Vegas down underTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: iTravel Agents frock-up to experience a slice of fabulous Las Vegas down underTravelandtourworld.com
text:
iTravel Agents frock-up to experience a slice of fabulous Las Vegas down under Published on : Monday, September 28, 2015
The Las Vegas Convention and Visitors Authority (LVCVA) teamed up with Australian travel agency chain, iTravel, last week to host ten agents for a night of Vegas style entertainment.
Agents were treated to the Sydney showing of Absinthe, a live show which combines old-world burlesque with world-class specialty acts and outrageous comedy.
The iTravel agents; Suzie Kairouz, Linda Hogan, Stacey Arthur, Divina Pratt, Melissa Delvin, Rebecca McHenry, Teresa Christopher and Elizabeth Frasca secured their seats after achieving top sales for Las Vegas during the recent #VegasNOTVegas social campaign, of which iTravel was the retail partner.
The evening enabled agents to familiarise themselves with one of the most unique shows on The Strip and see firsthand why Las Vegas is regarding as the ‘Entertainment Capital of the World’.
Sydney is the final leg of the Absinthe Australian tour and is scheduled to lower the red curtain on 25 October, 2015 before returning to Las Vegas.
Source:- Las Vegas Convention and Visitors Authority
